field.name: summary
field.value: Add composite-id support without the need for a seperate class.

field.name: description
field.value:
Add support for composite-id's with key-many-to-one attribute, or something similar. Currently, AR supports CompositeKeys as Foreign Keys via a seperate class. It would be very helpful to those who want to take existing domain models and use them with AR via attribution only.
see: http://thread.gmane.org/gmane.comp.windows.dotnet.castleproject.devel/5907/focus=5975

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: ActiveRecord is not actively maintained, closing this issue as won't fix because of its age. Feel free to relog a new issue on GitHub: https://github.com/castleproject/ActiveRecord/issues
